biography: Lee Kang-sheng  (Chinese: 李康生; Pinyin: Lǐ Kāngshēng, b. 1968 in Taipei, Taiwan) is a Taiwanese actor, film director, and screenwriter. He has appeared in all of Tsai Ming-liang's feature films. Lee's directorial efforts include The Missing in 2003 and Help Me Eros in 2007.
name: Lee Kang-sheng
